rules_text:
Wither [i](This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 black Horror creature token with wither that is tapped and attacking.
flavor_text: [i]New phyrexians have chosen to ignore the past ways of Yawgmoth. Only a few choose to delve into the magics that brought him to a godlike state.[/i]
